title: Robin Schmidt's Audio Engineering Tutorials
description:
This is the collection of tutorials located at http://www.rs-met.com/tutorials.html in one simple directory.
These tutorials are indispensable for any aspiring audio engineer or sound designer, as they cover various terms and concepts that one will need throughout one's entire career (or hobby).

These are free to download from Robin Schmidt's website, but are torrented mainly for dissemination to new audio engineers that would otherwise never find his site.

If you find these helpful, visit his site proper and check out his various VST plugins, both free and commercial.
